quotes.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Define success on your own terms, achieve it by your own rules, and build a life you’re proud to live.
quotes.author: Anne Sweeney

quotes.quote: You must expect failure as part of your journey of success, failure and success go hand in hand, you cannot have one without the other.
quotes.author: Richard Parkes

quotes.quote: No one ever made a difference by being like everyone else.
quotes.author: P.T. Barnum

quotes.quote: I am brave, I am bruised, I am who I'm meant to be – this is me.
quotes.author: The Greatest Showman
